index.subtext: From searching the state's citizen and vehicles database, filling documents for investigations, court and a livemap of your colleagues and dispatches.\n\nAll that and more, is (mostly) ready in this net, the FiveNet.

404.fun_error: Seems like you got lost. Let's get you back to the start!

logout.title: Signed out
logout.subtitle: You will be redirected to the home page in a moment.

introduction.pre_title: More time for GTA V RolePlay.
introduction.title: A better workflow
introduction.content: Easily search for citizens and vehicles. With the document access system it is easy to create and securely share documents with your colleagues. A livemap that shows last few dispatches and your colleagues locations.

feature_one.title: Search State Data.
feature_one.content: You can search through citizens and vehicles. You can also set a citizen as wanted.

feature_two.title: Secure Document Sharing.
feature_two.content: Documents can easily be shared with your colleagues and other factions on the server.

feature_three.title: Livemap.
feature_three.content: See the location of your colleagues and dispatches live. Different map styles are available as well.

one.question: Who has created FiveNet?
one.answer: Galexrt and Clover, are the main people working on FiveNet at the moment.

two.question: Why was FiveNet created?
two.answer: It started out as a way for Galexrt to learn frontend development and then it spiraled into a way for ModernV server to have an alternative to VPC CopNet/ MedicNet.

three.question: Where can I find the FiveNet development roadmap?

four.question: I found a bug or other issue with FiveNet. Where do I report it?
four.answer: Please report on the Galexrt Discord server or on the FiveNet GitHub project.

questions_or_issues.title: Got any questions or issues?
questions_or_issues.content: Be sure to join the Discord server should you encounter any issues or have questions regarding FiveNet.

features.citizens: Search and find information about Citizens, including basic info, their licenses and related documents.
features.vehicles: Search and find information about Vehicles.
features.documents: Search and create Documents, using templates or from scratch.
features.jobs: Infos about your job and employee management. Coming soon
features.livemap: Live position of dispatches and your colleagues.
